messages.subject: Re: Valerie's coming! Was: testers of knowledge

messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@n...> wrote:

> LIFE of Pensacola is sponsoring her visit, you can find us at
> pensacolaunschoolers.com. (Which is in need of updating...LeaAnn?
> where are you?) grins.


Hey, it's only been a year. Good thing my computer remembered the
password! I have updated the site and will add more info about
Valerie's visit when we know more. By the way Valerie, I linked to
your site....hope that's okay. Can't wait to meet you.

www.pensacolaunschoolers.com

LeaAnn

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Valerie's coming! Was: testers of knowledge
messages.msgSnippet: Ren: We are set for being there next year, but I would really love to be there on November 8th.  If you could either post it here, or e-mail me privatly with
messages.messageBody:
Ren:

We are set for being there next year, but I would really love to be there on November 8th. If you could either post it here, or e-mail me privatly with the info, when it is announced, I would appreciate it.

Michelle

Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
And yes Michelle, Valerie will be here to speak and sign her
book "The Unprocessed Child" on November 8th. Time and location to
be announced. So all you nearby Florida folks, come on over, we'll
have us an unschooling party that night.
LIFE of Pensacola is sponsoring her visit, you can find us at
pensacolaunschoolers.com. (Which is in need of updating...LeaAnn?
where are you?) grins.



---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Mail - 50x more storage than other providers!

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@n...> wrote:
> "I hope I helped. I fear I rambled."
>
> Dontcha love her rambings?:) Damn, I'm glad you're here Valerie!
>
>
> Ren

***** Damn, I'm glad I rambled. Thank you, Ren. And now I'm off to
Sacramento. I'm not nervous. I'm not nervous. I'm not nervous. No
really, I'm NOT nervous.

love, Valerie
www.ubpub.com

messages.subject: Valerie's coming! Was: testers of knowledge
messages.msgSnippet: I hope I helped. I fear I rambled. Dontcha love her rambings?:) Damn, I m glad you re here Valerie! And yes Michelle, Valerie will be here to speak and sign
messages.messageBody:
"I hope I helped. I fear I rambled."

Dontcha love her rambings?:) Damn, I'm glad you're here Valerie!

And yes Michelle, Valerie will be here to speak and sign her
book "The Unprocessed Child" on November 8th. Time and location to
be announced. So all you nearby Florida folks, come on over, we'll
have us an unschooling party that night.
LIFE of Pensacola is sponsoring her visit, you can find us at
pensacolaunschoolers.com. (Which is in need of updating...LeaAnn?
where are you?) grins.

And don't forget, next years Live and Learn will take place here
also.

Ren
